mapper.sql: JOB_RUNNING_INFO_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, JOB_RESULT, JOB_STATUS, JOB_STATUS_MESSAGE,EXECUTION_SUMMARY, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, PREVIOUS_FIRE_TIME, FIRE_TIME, NEXT_FIRE_TIME, REFIRE_COUNT, FIRE_INSTANCE_ID, SCHEDULER_INSTANCE_ID, SCHEDULED_FIRE_TIME, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15
mapper.select:
select
from sys_job_running_info
JOB_RUNNING_INFO_ID = #{jobRunningInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND JOB_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND JOB_GROUP like concat('%',concat(#{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND lower(JOB_STATUS) like lower(concat('%',concat(#{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')))
order by SCHEDULED_FIRE_TIME desc
mapper.delete: delete from SYS_JOB_RUNNING_INFO where job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and job_group = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
select SYS_JOB_RUNNING_INFO_s.nextval from dual
insert into SYS_JOB_RUNNING_INFO (JOB_RUNNING_INFO_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP,EXECUTION_SUMMARY, JOB_RESULT, JOB_STATUS, JOB_STATUS_MESSAGE, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, PREVIOUS_FIRE_TIME, FIRE_TIME, NEXT_FIRE_TIME, REFIRE_COUNT, FIRE_INSTANCE_ID, SCHEDULER_INSTANCE_ID, SCHEDULED_FIRE_TIME, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15) values (#{jobRunningInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{executionSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobStatusMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previousFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refireCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fireInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schedulerInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheduledFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update SYS_JOB_RUNNING_INFO
JOB_NAME = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTION_SUMMARY = #{executionSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_RESULT = #{jobResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_STATUS = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_STATUS_MESSAGE = #{jobStatusMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_NAME = #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_GROUP = #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVIOUS_FIRE_TIME = #{previousFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIRE_TIME = #{fireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NEXT_FIRE_TIME = #{nextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REFIRE_COUNT = #{refireCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIRE_INSTANCE_ID = #{fireInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEDULER_INSTANCE_ID = #{schedulerInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEDULED_FIRE_TIME = #{scheduledFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where JOB_RUNNING_INFO_ID = #{jobRunningInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_JOB_RUNNING_INFO set JOB_NAME = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},EXECUTION_SUMMARY = #{executionSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_RESULT = #{jobResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_STATUS = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_STATUS_MESSAGE = #{jobStatusMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_NAME = #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_GROUP = #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREVIOUS_FIRE_TIME = #{previousFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIRE_TIME = #{fireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NEXT_FIRE_TIME = #{nextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REFIRE_COUNT = #{refireCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIRE_INSTANCE_ID = #{fireInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEDULER_INSTANCE_ID = #{schedulerInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEDULED_FIRE_TIME = #{scheduledFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JOB_RUNNING_INFO_ID = #{jobRunningInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
